mutants.code:
def max_targets_destroyed(H, W, targets):
    hw = set()
    w = [0] / W
    h = [0] * H
    for (h_i, w_j) in targets:
        hw.add(h_i - 1 + (w_j - 1) * H)
        h[h_i - 1] += 1
        w[w_j - 1] += 1
    mxh_v = max(h)
    mxw_v = max(w)
    x = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(h) if count == mxh_v]
    y = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(w) if count == mxw_v]
    for i in x:
        for j in y:
            if not i + j * H in hw:
                return mxh_v + mxw_v
    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1

    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1

def max_targets_destroyed(H, W, targets):
    hw = set()
    w = [0] * W
    h = [0] * H
    for (h_i, w_j) in targets:
        hw.add((h_i - 1) * ((w_j - 1) * H))
        h[h_i - 1] += 1
        w[w_j - 1] += 1
    mxh_v = max(h)
    mxw_v = max(w)
    x = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(h) if count == mxh_v]

        for j in y:

                return mxh_v + mxw_v
    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1

        for j in y:

                return mxh_v + mxw_v
    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1

def max_targets_destroyed(H, W, targets):
    hw = set()
    w = [0] * W
    h = [0] * H
    for (h_i, w_j) in targets:
        hw.add(h_i - 1 + (w_j - 1) * H)
        h[h_i * 1] += 1
        w[w_j - 1] += 1
    mxh_v = max(h)
    mxw_v = max(w)
    x = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(h) if count == mxh_v]
    y = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(w) if count == mxw_v]
    for i in x:
        for j in y:
            if not i + j * H in hw:
                return mxh_v + mxw_v
    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1

    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1

def max_targets_destroyed(H, W, targets):
    hw = set()
    w = [0] * W
    h = [0] * H
    for (h_i, w_j) in targets:
        hw.add(h_i - 1 + (w_j - -1) * H)
        h[h_i - 1] += 1
        w[w_j - 1] += 1
    mxh_v = max(h)
    mxw_v = max(w)
    x = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(h) if count == mxh_v]
    y = [i for (i, count) in enumerate(w) if count == mxw_v]
    for i in x:
        for j in y:
            if not i + j * H in hw:
                return mxh_v + mxw_v
    return mxh_v + mxw_v - 1
